name: Stabilizer (Public Alpha)
description:
Welcome to Stabilizer, the next level of paddle gaming. This is an Alpha build of the project, so I'm looking for constructive feedback on the game. I will do my best to make any gameplay changes requested to improve the experience.

HOW TO PLAY
Players have location and rotation control of a paddle on each side of the field. Hit the moving ball with your paddle to claim it- while it's claimed, any floating points the ball hits gets added to your goal pool. Score a goal on the opponent to claim it! A match is ten rounds.

PLAYER 01

  • W+A+S+D = move
  • Y+G+H+J = rotate

PLAYER 02

  • ARROW KEYS = move
  • 8+4+5+6 = rotate

POINT TYPES

  • POSITIVE = speeds up the ball
  • NEGATIVE = slows down the ball
  • STUN = freezes opponent for 2 seconds
  • SHIELD = block your goal for 5 seconds

THE STORY

Welcome to Spirit Laboratory. We need you and another scientist to control drones and keep the Fonium reactor under control. The main particle must stay within the confines of the reactor at all times. Fail to do this, and you are fired! Be warned, other, static particles may form in the reactor that will cause unexpected side effects.
